bill.title: Hawaii Employment Relations Act; Prevention of Unfair Labor Practices
bill.description: Allows the Hawaii Labor Relations Board the option of serving complaints and notices of hearings via first class mail or by electronic means. (CD1)

history.action: Introduced.
Passed First Reading.
Referred to GVO, JDL.
The committee(s) on GVO has scheduled a public hearing on 02-11-16 1:15PM in conference room 414.

The committee(s) on GVO recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in GVO were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Kim, Ihara, Tokuda; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Slom; and 3 Excused: Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Keith-Agaran, Shimabukuro.
Reported from GVO (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2277) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to JDL.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to JDL.
The committee(s) on JDL will hold a public decision making on 03-02-16 10:02AM in conference room 016.

The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in JDL were as follows: 6 Aye(s): Senator(s) Keith-Agaran, Shimabukuro, Gabbard, K.Kahele; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) L. Thielen, Slom ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Kim.
Reported from JDL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2752) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading.
One Day Notice 03-08-16.
Report adopted; Passed Third Reading. Ayes, 24; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 1 (Senator(s) Riviere). Transmitted to House.
Received from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 294) in amended form (SD 1).
Pass First Reading
Referred to LAB, CPC, referral sheet 26
Bill scheduled to be heard by LAB on Tuesday, 03-15-16 10:30AM in House conference room 309.

The committees on LAB recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 10 Ayes: Representative(s) Nakashima, Keohokalole, Aquino, Har, Ichiyama, Johanson, LoPresti, San Buenaventura, Takumi, Yamashita; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Tupola.
Reported from LAB (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1154-16) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to CPC.

Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on CPC with Representative(s) McDermott, Thielen voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Kawakami, Kobayashi, Kong, Luke, Pouha, Rhoads excused (6).
Bill scheduled to be heard by CPC on Monday, 03-28-16 2:20PM in House conference room 325.
The committee(s) on CPC recommend(s) that the measure be deferred until 03-30-16 2:00PM.
Bill scheduled for decision making on Wednesday, 03-30-16 2:00PM in conference room 325.

The committees on CPC recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 13 Ayes: Representative(s) McKelvey, Woodson, Belatti, Brower, Creagan, Har, Hashem, Kawakami, Nakashima, Takayama, Yamane, Fukumoto Chang, McDermott; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) C. Lee, Oshiro, San Buenaventura.
Reported from CPC (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1680-16) as amended in HD 2, recommending passage on Third Reading.
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 04-12-16.

Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 2 with none voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) McDermott, Tupola voting no (2) and Representative(s) Ing, Thielen excused (2). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 589).
Senate disagrees with House amendments.
Received notice of disagreement (Sen. Com. No. 649).
House Conferees Appointed: Nakashima, McKelvey Co-Chairs; Keohokalole, Fukumoto Chang.
Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 613).
Senate Conferees Appointed: Kim Chair; Keith-Agaran Co-Chair; Slom.
Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 657).
Conference committee meeting scheduled for 04-27-16 2:10PM in conference room 414.

The Conference committee recommends that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes of the Senate Conference Managers were as follows: 2 Aye(s): Senator(s) Kim, Keith-Agaran; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Slom.

The Conference Committee recommends that the measure be Passed, with Amendments. The votes were as follows: 3 Ayes: Representative(s) Nakashima, McKelvey, Keohokalole; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Fukumoto Chang.
Reported from Conference Committee (Conf Com. Rep. No. 44-16) as amended in (CD 1).
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 05-03-16.
Reported from Conference Committee as amended CD 1 (Conf. Com. Rep. No. 44-16).
48 Hrs. Notice (as amended CD 1) 05-03-16.
Passed Final Reading, as amended (CD 1). 25 Aye(s); Aye(s) with reservations: none . 0 No(es): none. 0 Excused: none.
Passed Final Reading as amended in CD 1 with none voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Tupola voting no (1) and none excused (0).
Received notice of Final Reading (Sen. Com. No. 715).
Received notice of passage on Final Reading in House (Hse. Com. No. 685).
Enrolled to Governor.
